thread.title: Google celebrates late Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's 67th b'day
thread.title_full: Google celebrates late Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's 67th b'day - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Google celebrates late Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's 67th b'day
text:
*New Delhi, Oct 13 (ANI): Google has marked late legendary Pakistan i musician Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's 67th birthday on its homepage with an animated doodle.*
New Delhi, Oct 13 (ANI): Google has marked late legendary Pakistani musician Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's 67th birthday on its homepage with an animated doodle. Google users can see the late 'Afreen Afreen' singer's animated picture on the Google logo, where he is sitting and singing qawwali while his team members are playing instruments. Born in the year 1948, the Shahenshah-e-Qawwali passed away at a very early age of 48 due to a cardiac arrest on August 16, 1997. Carrying forward the 600-year-old tradition of Qawwali in his family, he is known for his long hour performances and bringing the magic of Qawwali music to international audience. (ANI) Â»
